website_summaries.verdict: Natural ingredients without chemicals works with your skin pigment for a natural look.
pros: Tinted lotion helps you see where the lotion has been applied so you can achieve a smooth color
A comparable result to airbrush spray tans, with an appealing coconut scent
cons: The color needs a long time to set before being waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Still love it though
customer_reviews.text: I have really pale skin and it's been extremely hard for me to find a natural looking gradual tanning lotion that doesn't turn me orange. Fake Bake looks almost purple based and I come out looking naturally sun-kissed every time! It's not streaky and it hasn't stained my clothes or bed sheets. It takes me MAYBE 10 minutes to apply once every 4-5 days. My only complaint is that it doesn't last quite as long as other products I've used. Still love it though, and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: moden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & natural looking tan!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It goes on lightly and additional coats will darken it, so you don’t look like you rolled in Doritos. It gave me a nice, natural looking tan. Helpful hints: I put oil free lotion on my hands, feet, elbows, knees and face. Then did a light swipe over those areas and didn’t end up with any streaks or spots. Also, make sure you don’t have any deodorant on when you use it, because the tanner will cling to it and you’ll have spots, so before bed is optimal. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grandbois

customer_reviews.title: Love FakeBake!
customer_reviews.text: Love FakeBake!! I can get this for half the price on Amazon versus the local beauty store in my town. It glides in so easily with the mit and you look bronzed and tanned right away. Half the color washes off after the first shower but you're left with a decent base color. I keep layering on every couple of days and have achieved fantastic results. Just be careful because before washing the product off, it does stain sheets, loathes, pillowcases, etc. Not streaky either! Dry natural looking :-)
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bluhm

customer_reviews.title: Bomb.com - get the mitt
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best self-tanner I’ve used. As a transparent vampire with see-through skin videoing on translucent and a self-professed self-tanning/spray-tanning expert... you can trust me on this one. Won’t disappoint. Apply more than one coat after drying for an even darker look. Must get the mitt if you’re doesn't come with one - game changer - no streaks!
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I read reviews some said this was horrible and then I read one that was very long and said if you follow directions this is great....well I followed directions and this was horrible. It smells bad even after you wash it off the next morning, you could still smell it. It lasted 2 days and then it was very blotchy. My foot is tan but my shin is white as a ghost! I would not recommend this at all. I will go back to the more expensive tanner I used before. And you can't return this or get a refund save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for us fair skinned girls
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love FakeBake! I am about as pale as they come considering I'm Irish and Welsh so you can imagine how fair I am. I've tried probably about 30 different faux tanners over the years and this is my favorite because it's so convenient and you can see the oroductvas it goes on. This helps to prevent streaks and blotchiness. I even use it on my face and it doesnt make my skin look dull. The only thing I would recommend is to use an exfoliator for the entire body before application and make sure to moisturize the days following application.
customer_reviews.author: theresa martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I work in the ED at a hospital and half of our staff uses it. That’s how I heard of it. I do like it. It is easy to use and easy to apply and got me a tan. People definitely noticed. It’s definitely streak free. My only issue was that it transferred after three days of it on my toilet which was weird lol. Besides that great product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Take your time when applying, you’ll get amazing results!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never purchase a different brand of sled tanner. Ever. I can spend $20 on a bottle that’ll last me about 4 months of $25 on a 1 time spray tan that’ll last me maybe at most a week. This long wearing formula doesn’t have a bad smell and lasts a good while on the skin. My recommendation is to wash the hand mit after every use to make sure you have an even coverage. I can easily build this depending on how bronzed I want to be . Compared to other self tanners this does not leave an orange look.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Best natural looking self tanner I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a die hard banana boat self tanner. But they changed there product formula and it’s sticky and streaky. So I gave this bad boy a try and I am impressed. Do it at night. Exfoliate first. And wear long sleeves and long pants to bed. You will wake up extremely 🍊 but have no fear it will wash off leaving a beautiful tan. I also watched a few YouTube tutorials first which helped me know how to handle the product. I’m hooked now😂
customer_reviews.author: KENZIE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased . For me it worked best to apply this product in the afternoon and let it dry for about 30 min before putting on loose clothing and waiting to shower until the following day . It seems to last longer if I follow those steps . It leaves a natural tan not orange looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: mindy bailey

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunless tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is one of the only tanners I have every used that did not give me an orange color and I am on the paler side. It goes on easy and doesn't collect around my ankles and knees excessively, even when I am taking extra care, like others do. It builds well if I apply it days in a row and I do not mind the scent like I do with others. I feel that I have an extra sensitive sense of smell so that is really saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Christyna Orr

customer_reviews.title: Lasting, Natural Looking Tan
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic self-tanner. I just use it on my legs, and it lasts forever. I’m still on the first bottle I bought a year ago (I only use during seasons I show my legs of course). The only con is it being a spray bottle, it does seem to get all over my bathroom floor even if I spray direct on my legs - but I just go over my floor with two baby wipes after I’m finished “tanning” and that cleans is up. No streaks and looks totally natural. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I believe I have said it before, but I'll say it again. This is the BEST self-tanning product on the market. This is my 3rd bottle and I will never use anything else. Package comes properly sealed and always on time. It's also the best color. I am a very pale person (by nature) but always self-tan. Other products made my skin look orange or "fake". This looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L. Rezzino

customer_reviews.title: Best sunless tanner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunless tanner I have ever used. No streaks. Easy to apply. Nice scent when applying, but then no scent after it dries. Gives a nice brown tint to skin with no orange tint. Also very moisturizing. Only have to apply once weekly to keep a nice glow to skin. Love this and will order again and again.
customer_reviews.author: kecoleman

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many, many sunless tanning options. You cannot beat this one! Especially for the price! I am very fair completed and have had trouble getting a natural looking color on my skin. The color is beautiful! and streak free thanks to the mitt that comes in the package. And no more orange hands thanks to the gloves in the package. Oh, and no strong sunless tanner smell either! Winner all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to some reviews, this product isn’t that great. The initial bronze color during the application process is good. The subsequent self tanner color distribution (which happens after a couple of hours) is Irregular and unpredictable. There are better products out there. Also, Amazon will not return this item so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tjacobson

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Self Tanner I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I almost expected to be disappointed with this, but it truly is amazing. The smell is fantastic - a light coconut tropical smell. With it on my skin I don’t smell that gross self tanner smell, only slightly when sweating. The color is so natural, too! With Jergens or other brands, you can tell it’s fake in the sunlight, but not with this! The mitt does leave some lint on your skin, but it doesn’t affect the application. I will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ebling

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: I had a pool party to go to in the middle of winter in Ohio. So I needed a fake tan for sure. This cake highly recommended. I followed all the directions: shower, shave, exfoliate. Yet somehow the the tan came out streaky and orange. It left any part of me that wasn’t made to be 100% smooth, looking like I took a dip in a clay puddle. It was very muddy. It also didn’t last long. The smooth parts of me last for about two days. My elbows, hands, knees and my post preggo belly scars held tight to the tan for a good two weeks. Not a cute look at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Natural streakfree color
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you shower, shave and exfoliate . Then apply oil free moisture to feet, ankles, knees, elbows, hands , and face before application. But the color is supper natural and streak free. I put it on before bed then get in the shower to rinse and apply baby oil. I love it and put it on 2 times a week .
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Was not splotchy and just faded away
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonders! No streaking or blotching. I had a hard time with the hands but its trial and error. I liked that it didn't get blotchy when it started to go away. It just faded away. You may have to wear scented lotion because it smells after you wash it off. Putting it on, it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Looked for a over a decade, this is the best one ever!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 5 years and got my friends to use it also, dries immediately, has a slight smell but it washes off quickly, doesn't stain anything. Evenly applies, I use a little lotion after application on my knuckles, elbows, knees, feet, etc, and it blends perfectly. I can't get over how easy and fast it is!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Genova, Social & Speaking Anxiety Coach

customer_reviews.title: The best sunless tanner ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to many sunless tanners over the years. Nothing compares to this one. I’ve used it for years. Easy to apply and you can see the results instantly and be streak/splotch free. Stays on for longer than most sunless tanners. The tint on this is perfect and doesn’t even have a hint of any orange tones. It looks completely natural. Just seriously an amazing product and keeps me looking tan while protected from the sun and not having to spend hours sunbathing either. I get so many compliments when I use this tanner... my makeup just goes on more beautifully, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that when you apply the tan you immediately see color results. What I don’t like is the fact that it comes off. If it gets wet (ex: water splashing on your arm or leg) it streaks up. It rubs off or comes off. I don’t like that & also the color does not last long. It washes off in the bath. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber LaShay Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal/ no product
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my product the seal was broken and there’s water inside the container! It was really disappointing since I had already bought this product before and I love it! I don’t understand how something like this can happen!! So bad
customer_reviews.author: Flavia

customer_reviews.title: Washes off after a day or two..wasn’t impressed
customer_reviews.text: Washes off after a day or two. Was hoping it would last a week like the spray tan at a salon. Would have returned but it not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite self tanners
customer_reviews.text: I have always really like Fake Bake self tanners....I have noticed the price has increased quite a bit over the past years. I used to be able to get 2 for $30 off of Amazon. Either way product is easy to use and color isn't too orange or streaky. I use it before bed and shower the following morning. For darker color i will use two days in a row and it will last about 2-3 days before i need to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not the real FakeBake
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been getting fakebake off of Amazon for years and this was the first time I purchased from this seller. It was darker than the usual fakebake (but doesn’t make you very tan) and smells kinda weird (fakebake usually smells more like coconut and this was just a weird burnt smell). I thought maybe it was just me but I bought from a different seller and the product was way better. I don’t know if this is just a watered down version of fakebake or what, but I would buy from someone else, not this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for two years. I am super pale but this helps give me a nice color. If you leave it on over night I suggest washing your face off or it may be too drastic in the morning. Make sure to not be active or sit where your legs are bent touching skin to skin as the color may pull off as it's drying. Exfoliating before application is definitely best and putting lotion or oil on elbows, knees, ankles and anywhere like will help prevent excess color build up
customer_reviews.author: MFish

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I’m very pale with a ruddy/pink undertone. This looks natural and not orange. The smell is very nice and subtle. Using a mit to apply this product is very important. I do feel like you need two coats.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This. Save Yourself the Hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I have used several self tan products over the years... and this one by far was the hardest product to use. The spray applicator is terrible, blotches everywhere, and sprays everywhere and gets all over your bathroom. The color is extremely bronze and brown. Not subtle at all. I am extremely disappointed in this product. The mit that it comes with sucks and just absorbs all the product. I tried using gloves to apply and the product refused to blend in. Terrible purchase. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: After reading glowing reviews on this product I decided to give it a try. It didn’t work at all. Absolutely no difference . I have had much better results from an $8 self tanner. To say it’s not worth the money would be an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dillard

customer_reviews.title: It gives you an instant beautiful color that gets prettier after the 3 application
customer_reviews.text: It gives you an instant beautiful color that gets prettier after the 3 application. However, it really does not last that long. The instructions say you only need to retouch once a week, but I feel that after the 2-3 day, the color is almost gone. For the price, I was expecting a more lasting result. But the color is beautiful. I'm only using it for special occasions when I'm wearing a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma R.

customer_reviews.title: BrittneyTucker8619
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. I love how easy it is to apply. it takes a few minutes to dry and that’s annoying I sweat a lot and I afraid it will streak I didn’t shower or exfoliate before and the turn out was great. I wish it had cake with a better applicator glove the one with an actual thumb in it would be better than the plain black one with no thumb space is hard to hold onto. Overall great product. I will recommend to my friends! Big thanks to Christina Randall on YouTube her video is what made me purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: BrittneyTucker8619

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this.
customer_reviews.text: I like the glove and the color isn't bad but it's difficult to apply without getting streaks. Plus you have to make sure to take a shower the next morning because 50% will come off with just a rinse. Not a fan
customer_reviews.author: Sleenie

customer_reviews.title: For us gingers lol
customer_reviews.text: Only place I get mine! I love it so much and I'm a ginger lol does not make you orange. And stays on pretty good through my hiit park workouts living out here in Texas!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Fields

customer_reviews.title: Buy this stuff
customer_reviews.text: So I’m normally whiter than a marshmallow. But this stuff. HOLY CRAP. It smells great, easy to use and apply. Clear directions. Not orange in the least bit and it stays on for at least a week. (I’ve only had to do one application in a week). Recommend 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Best Self Tanner that I've ever tried!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very pale skin and have tried numerous self tanners including St. Tropaz and Vita Liberata. This one is by far the best and it's very inexpensive. I apply it at night and reapply every other day and it looks natural. It doesn't look orange or dry your skin out like others do. I highly recommend this self tanner!
customer_reviews.author: Leah M

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only self tanner I have used that is easy and looks amazing on my skin. Other brands have been too streaky or broke my skin out, but this product works great for me! I have bought several times and HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jesslyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This Works Instantly and it gives u a nice natural tan NOT ORANGE! I will buy again and again I have a pool party to attend in 2 days and I’m looking nice and tan!
customer_reviews.author: Dian Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a really dark, deep brown color. I was shocked. I have tried so many fake tans. My fake tan I got for 40$ was nothing compared to this! I barely have any streaks and I apply it fast. Really good color
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Not fake bake!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying fake bake from this seller for years, no issues. Recently within the past few months the quality of the products have changed. I am now breaking out, I have boils on my skin from this last bottle, and the color immediately rinses off despite leaving it on. Buyer beware, this is not the original fake bake!
customer_reviews.author: taylor2009

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst self tanner I’ve ever tried. I’m an experienced self tanner and I did everything right. My ENTIRE tan literally washed off the second I stepped in the shower and I’m right back to super pale. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this about three times now, and I have been very pleased so far! I am naturally extremely pale and pretty new to self-tanning. Fake Bake was super easy to apply with the mitt provided, easy to tell where it's going on, and left me with a very even application every time. Will be re-purchasing!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah McKinstry

customer_reviews.title: Good, but easy to mess up
customer_reviews.text: This is my first liquid tanning product. My biggest issue with it is that it settles into the pores on my legs. It dries very fast, which is both a blessing and a curse. I am super pale so self tanners typically make me look orange. This one doesn't. It's a good neutral tan shade-- not too green either.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Worst Self Tanner I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try after hearing good things about the product, but after multiple tries, I can honestly say this is the worst self tanner I have EVER used. Even after having dried for over 15 hours, once I showered it washed right off. The smell is awful as well. **If you are looking for an amazing self tanner, Loving Tan has been my go to for years and is incredible! (I’m extremely sorry I gave this a try, big mistake!)**
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Ok, have used better for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: While this tanner is ok, I've found the Australian Gold to have a more golden tone while this brand is more brown. This is a nice product, but I've used better that was not as expensive. Australian gold also lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Tan Everytime
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great tan even after first use! I use it about every three days and it works the same every time. No streaking, no discoloration and best of all -no orange coloring!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! Smell isn’t terrible and it’s super easy to apply a streak-free application with the mitt. Works just as good as a 50.00 spray tan. I just wish I could get it on my back. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cemo

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanner since the 90's
customer_reviews.text: SINCE the early 90's...I LOVE FAKE BAKE! I ordered my first bottle back before self tanners were in major stores!!! I am 56 now, yes I was young when this great stuff came out! I had forgotten about it for a while, then a light bulb went off after many walmart orange tans. Looked it up! Now I am brooze and FEEL beautiful again! We can always be tan, Thx Cindy
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this stuff is not a good choice for me. It reacted with skin products I use every day to control blemishes, so I had to discontinue using it. Otherwise I’d say it’s a decent self tanner as long as you follow the instructions
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: Not orange no streaks
customer_reviews.text: This gives a perfect tan just doesn’t last as long as I’d like I have to re apply every 3 days for the tan I want to keep. Not orange or funky colored at all. Also it’s super easy to spread without streaking
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s the only one I’ve ever used that gives a really nice bronze color, doesn’t look fake at all. Easy to apply and comes with a great mitt. The scent is strong but it’s not unpleasant, no one noticed it but me.
customer_reviews.author: Keri A

customer_reviews.title: Great for those of us who are bad at applying fake tanners!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Simple to use, you can see where you're putting it and it looks completely natural. Will definitely purchase again. One downside is that the mitt that comes with it is not great. The fabric pills up and comes off on your skin. I bought the three piece mitt set on amazon for about $10 and it has made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia L Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Self-Tanner
customer_reviews.text: Gives a bronze tan as opposed to the greenish tint of St. Tropez. It is also darker than the OG St. Tropez. I like both this one and the Flawless Darker.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Damn near magical!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about these from you tuber Christina Randall who shows how she uses it and I was so happy with my results! Where have you been all my life?! So easy to use! Absolutely no complaints. Even when I’m in a hurry and do a sloppy job it is forgiving. I’m super pale and never tan indoor or out. My new favorite product! I ordered 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Marques

customer_reviews.title: Not long wearing
customer_reviews.text: This product gives you an instant tan and most people noticed and said i looked really tan, but the next day after a shower, it is pretty much gone. No color stays on my skin. This is nice if you want an instand tan but not for staying tan for long.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I’ve used a lot of self tanner in my life time and this is by far the easiest to use. I never really got the hang of applying any other sunless tanner but this one was so fool proof. My tan is even and natural. I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Terri teaster

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many self tanners before and this is the one! Everything about it is great. I do not regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wagenbach

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have been using fake bake for 3 years now and as long as you do t over do it you have the perfect summer tan!
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 1 day. Next best thing to a spray tan.
customer_reviews.text: If you're saving money on professional spray tans, this is the next best thing. Doesn't last very long though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hess

customer_reviews.title: a bit darker than need be but quality product
customer_reviews.text: a tad too bronzy. was good two later when wore off a bit:) bought the Body tan too... bronzy... will be great in summer when I have base tan!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy k

customer_reviews.title: Streak Free
customer_reviews.text: It goes on dark so you can see where it is, which helps avoid streaks. Don't wear white after. Wait the several hours, shower, then glow.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: No smell, natural looking and works well around ankles and wrists.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of self tanning products over the years. A friend told me about Fake Bake and after trying it for New Years Eve it is by FAR my favorite one I have used. I’m hooked!!! It didn’t have a smell until the next day, but it wasn’t strong at all. It didn’t have an orange color to it only a natural brown and it’s the only self tanner I have used that looks good around my wrists and ankles.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a new design for the bottle but the tanner works the same and smells the same, my all time favorite self tanner.
customer_reviews.author: adriana coulman

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to get a nice tanned color. It never streaks, smells pleasant and works well. I put it on at night and sleep in it. The next morning I have a nice tan going
customer_reviews.author: Buck30

customer_reviews.title: Better than a tanning salon
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and fast. It’s easy to use and has a very mild scent. I strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellemmy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure this is a FAKE...it was very watered down. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this brand at Ulta for about 2 years and I truly LOVE it!! It goes on smooth and no streaks but this one was very very watery and streaky. It was as if it was an off brand or not really the "Fake Bake" brand itself. I was very disappointed when I used it and it was not what I had hoped for or been used to at all!! :(
customer_reviews.author: christina spangler

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bronzer in it so you can see right away where it is going! I am very pale and this gives me the perfect tan- doesn’t make me look orange either. No streaks. Smells good. I’m sold.
customer_reviews.author: Candy.G

customer_reviews.title: Must have during the summer!!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for summer. Great product, simple to use. Do not doing dirty marks on body. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patrycja

customer_reviews.title: However though it did make me dark and lasted for days..Its just made  my dark spots appear more
customer_reviews.text: Even though it really didn't work for me that well because I have a lot of spots on my skin. Now I use something that makes my skin skin look flawless , and i love it
customer_reviews.author: Catherine castro

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanning Spray I've Tried!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this when I commented on her tan which looked so natural. Not super expensive, nice Mitt, goes on easily, *****
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca61

customer_reviews.title: Good color, ease of use. Low odor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Long handled lotion sponge comes in handy for the back. Good color, low scent. Toned down and removed any scent after first shower. Good color too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best fake tan!
customer_reviews.text: The best self tanner. Easy to apply and goes on smoothly. Even I can’t mess it up:) no fake smell. Love this product. It’s my second purchase of it and one last forever!
customer_reviews.author: bridget raines

customer_reviews.title: Tan looks good
customer_reviews.text: Tan looks great but messy when applying. Leaves marks on sheets but washes out in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell!!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is absolutely awful! The tan was dark until I showered, which is a must due to the awful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great sunless tan!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product several times , I have very light skin (red head). This is the best tanner I've ever used, the color is great and the smell is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is not expensive compared to other brands! I use this formula for over 5 years and love it! I don’t look orange and it gives me a nice build able tan!
customer_reviews.author: Wojtek B.

customer_reviews.title: Orange & streaky
customer_reviews.text: East to use, like the mitt that comes with but there’s a pungent smell and it’s orange and streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Van Zant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & even tan!
customer_reviews.text: i didn't know this product even existed. it works so well. After it dries up it doesn't smear. You look tanned and it last even after a shower or two. You could re-apply as often & keep yourself tanned whenever you decide.
customer_reviews.author: Katti Zand

customer_reviews.title: Fave Self Tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my favorite self-tanner! It smells good & easy to put on! It stays for about 3-4 days and the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lauren Browning

customer_reviews.title: Always my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This dries almost immediately. Color is natural. Seems to last. Been using it at least 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Def makes you tan
customer_reviews.text: Kinda smells bad but works awesome. I even was ballsy enough to use on my face and it worked great. Smells weird after it sets but my perfume covered it.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not tan in the sun and this product is the best tanning spray I have ever used. I have tried several different brand and this is the first that does not leave lines or streaks. It goes on instantly so you immediately know if you miss a spot. Will keep buying this for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, natural-looking tan
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for several years, is the most natural looking self-tanner i’ve tried. I use it once or twice a week in the summer to keep the gorgeous, sun-tanned look
customer_reviews.author: Bubba's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great dark tan fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for years nothing else I’ve tried compares.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Was spending $35+ on a tanner from Sephora... NEVER AGAIN! Love this stuff! Goes on so easy & even! I'm super pale and this gives me such a great color! I've already used it about 5 times and have barely made a dent in the bottle! I've recommended it to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the BOMB 💣 It’s so easy to put in and it gives a beautiful tan.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite self tanning product
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite self tanning product. I love how natural the tan looks when applied, it’s not streaky & splotchy like most self tanning products. Will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: No streaks no orange color
customer_reviews.text: Went on very easy, no streaks, color looked very natrual and lasted awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Luv this stuff. Only thing I’d change is the smell. It’s not that bad but bad enough.
customer_reviews.author: QCP

customer_reviews.title: Better than going to get sprayed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a spray tan membership I will not be renewing because this is much more cost effective and looks just as good if not better! It’s very easy to apply and the results are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair No More!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched my whole adult life for a decent product as I'm super fair. This stuff is fantastic! I'm only at day one, but the immediate color helped me know where to apply and bonus, instant tan! Maybe the best part is no smelly skin. Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Best natural color!
customer_reviews.text: Use this all spring and summer for a natural looking glow. Never streaks or looks orange.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, has a mit with latex gloves for application. Doesn’t leave you orange and doesn’t rub off on clothing.
customer_reviews.author: sewred

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to apply. I haven’t had any luck with self tanners but this one is amazing! I look like I just returned from a beach vacation! My tan looks natural and has not orange at all. Love love love this product !
customer_reviews.author: Emilee sawyers

customer_reviews.title: Looks very natural
customer_reviews.text: My daughter use this product at a friends house and she loved it. So I ordered it online from Amazon and it’s one of the best self tanning lotions we’ve used. I will be buying this product on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: My favorite self tanner. Apply and leave on. I don't recommend washing off. Reapply as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bosteen20

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner Iv ever used. And I’m naturally very pale. It’s not orange or streaky
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Reapply every 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on a couple of days, best to apply after a warm bath at night. Will set in overnight while you sleep. Some will rinse off the next day when you bath.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Color goes on easily and is buildable. Doesn’t look orange.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schaefer

product_meta.title: Fake Bake Flawless Self-Tanning Liquid Spray 6 oz
feature_bullets: NEED A TAN TODAY? This tropical scented, non-sticky formula dries quickly for a beautiful, glowing tan that develops in about 4-6 hours.

WE PROVIDE THE TOOLS, YOU ENJOY YOUR TAN - Fake Bake has a built-in color guide so you can see where you’re applying the self-tanning product on your skin, ensuring streak-free application. Also includes a professional mitt to assist with your new glow!
NATURALLY WORKS WITH EVERY TONE - Fake Bake products work for everyone, no matter what skin tone or type you have, because our ingredients work to enhance your skin’s unique pigment.

GET A TAN ON YOUR OWN TIME - Whether you need to apply on the go in the mornings, or you like to apply before bed and shower in the morning, the color stays completely natural and leaves your skin with a flawless glow.
FAST ABSORBING FORMULA - Because this isn’t a lotion there’s no moisturizer in the product which usually contributes to the length of drying time; lotions take longer to soak into the skin.
